atm.model

Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • atm.model.BankAccount

  • public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    BankAccount class containing bank account information (name, id, balance, etc.) and methods to manipulate balance.
    Author:
    Chris Carson

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String ID,
                   java.lang.String PIN,
                   java.math.BigDecimal balance)
        Default constructor for BankAccount
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the bank account. (i.e Checking, Savings, etc.)
        ID - Identifier of the bank account.
        PIN - Personal Identification Number used to authenticate ownership of account.
        balance - Total money in a bank account.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
              throws InsufficientFundsException,
                     AccountLockException
        Performs a withdraw on the account decrementing Balance by amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - BigDecimal amount to withdraw.
        Throws:
        InsufficientFundsException - Withdraw > Balance.
        AccountLockException - BankAccount is locked.

      • deposit

        public void deposit(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
             throws AccountLockException
        Performs a deposit on the account incrementing Balance by amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - BigDecimal amount to deposit.
        Throws:
        AccountLockException - BankAccount is locked.
